value.name: POLICE NEWS: Several arrests reported by local police
value.description: William Fireline, 19, 484 Broadmore Estates, Goshen, was arrested by Elkhart County police and jailed on charges of burglary and domestic battery after he allegedly entered a home in the 23000 block of Nora Street around 5:20 p.

value.name: Chicago Man Arrested In Undercover Sex Sting After Arranging To Meet 15-Year-Old Boy For Sex, Police Say
value.description: Police said on Tuesday Jaime Garcia used a dating app to arrange to meet a 15-year-old boy for sex. An undercover officer was posing as the boy. Zach LaVine Returns To Practice; Bulls Playoff ...
